vehicles.description: A dark-colored sedan is located to the left of this vehicle, facing the camera, and appears to be either parked or moving slowly.
vehicles.explanation: Due to the proximity to this vehicle, be cautious to prevent it from changing lanes or opening doors.

vulnerable_road_users.description: A pedestrian wearing a white hat is walking a light brown, medium-sized dog on the right side of the road, crossing the street in front of a parked car.
vulnerable_road_users.explanation: Pedestrians and dogs are directly on this lane and have the right of way, which requires this vehicle to yield and ensure their safety.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the observed traffic scene, there's a dark-colored sedan situated to the left of our vehicle, either parked or in motion at a low speed. Extreme caution is advised due to the risk of this sedan changing lanes or its occupants opening doors into the path of our vehicle.

On the right side of the road, a pedestrian in a white hat, accompanied by a light brown, medium-sized dog, is seen crossing the street in front of a parked car. It is imperative for our vehicle to give way to the pedestrian and dog, as they have the right of way and are directly in our lane, demanding immediate action to ensure their safety.

driving_suggestion: Vehicles should come to a complete stop to allow pedestrians and dogs to pass safely, and should be prepared for any potential movements from vehicles parked on the left. After the pedestrians have passed, the vehicle should slowly cross the speed bump, while being aware of any other possible road users or obstacles.

1.description and explanation: This is a domesticated animal, commonly known as a dog. As a moving object that can act unpredictably, it should be monitored carefully by the ego car. The presence of the dog means that the ego car might need to slow down or adjust its path to ensure safety for all parties involved, and avoid any sudden movements that could startle or harm the animal.
